data.event: Pana was first known as Stone Coal Precinct when it was founded on June 6, 1845.

event.title: was later changed to Pana Township on September 2, 1856

data.event: The name was later changed to Pana Township on September 2, 1856.

event.title: 1857, the village of Pana was incorporated

data.event: In 1857, the village of Pana was incorporated.
